summary:
* Products 

    * #### PRODUCTS

      * Liquid Network

Bitcoin layer-2 for digital asset issuance.

      * Blockstream AMP

An API to issue and manage digital assets on the Liquid Network.

      * Blockstream Finance

Financial products for the  
Bitcoin era.

      * Core Lightning

Our own implementation of the Lightning protocol.

      * Blockstream Mining

Colocation services for Bitcoin mining operations.

      * Cryptocurrency Data Feed

Real-time and historical cryptocurrency trade data.

      * Blockstream Energy

Instant energy demand from the Bitcoin network.

      * Blockstream Satellite

The Bitcoin blockchain, delivered from space.

      * Elements

An open-source, sidechain-capable blockchain platform.

#### WALLETS & EXPLORER

      * Blockstream Jade

A fully open-source hardware wallet for Bitcoin and Liquid.

      * Blockstream Green

A multi-platform, feature-rich Bitcoin and Liquid wallet.

      * Blockstream Explorer

Search data from the Bitcoin and Liquid blockchains.

English

# Rethinking Trust.

Blockstream is the global leader in Bitcoin and blockchain technology. Our
products and services form the foundations for the financial infrastructure of
the future.

## Expanding the capabilities of Bitcoin

Our suite of technologies enhances the Bitcoin ecosystem, making it easier for
individuals and businesses to secure and transact their digital assets.

### Blockstream Mining

#### Enterprise-class Bitcoin miner hosting

 _Learn More _

### Blockstream Satellite

#### Connect to Bitcoin without the internet

 _Learn More _

### Liquid Network

#### Bitcoin layer-2 for digital asset issuance

 _Learn More _

### Core Lightning

#### Scalable Lightning Network implementation

 _Learn More _

## The Liquid Network

Bitcoin's leading sidechain, enabling fast, confidential transactions, and the
issuance of assets.

Read Whitepaper

Your browser does not support the video tag.

### Explore Liquid

Browse Liquid transactions recorded on the sidechain in Blockstream Explorer.

Asset directory

### Issue an asset

Learn how to issue security tokens, stablecoins, and other assets on the
Liquid Network.

Blockstream AMP

### Support

Browse our explainers and guides for the Liquid Network, or contact our
support team.

Help Center

## Set up a wallet

Manage your bitcoin and Liquid assets in one of our world-class wallet apps.

Get Green wallet
